name: Street Fighter 2 The World Warrior
description:
It's time to defend your title as champion of Street Fighter!!!

Capcom's legendary arcade smash hit Street Fighter 2 The World Warrior has finally arrived on X-Station. Featuring all 12 fighters from the classic arcade game. 3 Bonus Games are just waiting for you like smashing a car, breaking a wall and destroying barrels. Plus, each character has an intro and ending. Learn new moves and see if you have what it takes to be the champion of street fight once again.
